hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e
# don't build here, just test existing images to speed up demo
SQUAD_SERVER=squad SQUAD_BACKEND=lava.server SQUAD_TOKEN=2d703e793ea345efdbab52d95fe33ec715bcc2d4 SQUAD_GROUP=Linaro SQUAD_PROJECT=openembedded-x15 VERSION="631" FILESERVER=fileserver LAVA_JOB_TEMPLATE_URL=http://${FILESERVER}/job-templates/x15-openembedded.yaml
# Retrieve lava job template wget ${LAVA_JOB_TEMPLATE_URL} -O lava_job_template.yaml
# Substitute with build info (nothing to do) envsubst < lava_job_template.yaml > lava_job.yaml
LAVA_JOB_DEFINITION=$(cat lava_job.yaml)
# Submit to squad curl \ --header "Auth-Token: ${SQUAD_TOKEN}" \ --form backend=${SQUAD_BACKEND} \ --form definition="${LAVA_JOB_DEFINITION}" \ http://${SQUAD_SERVER}/api/submitjob/${SQUAD_GROUP}/${SQUAD_PROJECT}/${VERSION}/jenkins
